name: Pen Fight Dungeon
description:
Thanks to my poor time management, the tutorial sucks. 

Click and drag anywhere on your pen to move it.  

Rules:

  • Game switches between turn based and free roam mode depending on if enemies are in range
  • Reach the stairs in each room
  • Don't fall off the table (floor)
  • You can have 2 power ups at a time (get them in chests)
  • Power Ups Break Over Time

Made for #7DRL by Amar Ravi. 

Dungeon Tileset was sourced and modified (will add link soon) 
Font is from Kenny's Asset bundle
Music is "Cat Shat in the Box" by Josh Pan from Youtube Audio Library

Everything else was made by me during the Jam.
